description: Ben Shaoul/Ismael Levya 14-story dorm set to hit Kips Bay. [BBH] Who knew you could turn a profit with an underground parking garage? [NYT] Now that it's not free, Cooper Union's tax benefit is coming under scrutiny. [Arch] Dan Gardodnick fears for Midtown's future without Time Warner.
title: On the Market: Profitable Parking; Cooper Union Under Fire; Another Penthouse for 432 Park
content:
Ben Shaoul/Ismael Levya 14-story dorm set to hit Kips Bay. Who knew you could turn a profit with an underground parking garage? [NYT]
Now that it's not free, Cooper Union's tax benefit is coming under scrutiny. Dan Gardodnick fears for Midtown's future without Time Warner.[DNA]
Another floor and $85 million penthouse planned for 432 Park. Queens BP signs off on Willets Point mall.[NYDN]
Architects head to the Garment District. Mercedes House is getting a mom-and-pop grocery store. Northside Piers builder is planning a seven-story, 164-unit building at 149 Kent. The Staten Island Railway kinda sucks.[SAS]
Sam Schneider has a $400 million property empire, but a home is too expensive to buy.[NYT]
New York City: it's got lighthouses![UC]
